location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 48 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Short letter that discusses finanical issues and reports the news that Zolfikar Cahn has been killed and his head sent to Schyras [Shiraz]. The letter also states that Sadoo Cahn [Sadiq Khan] appears to be firmly established in government. Shipped by Hamdan.
